A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So many holes in the plot line\, I don't know where to begin. The entire movie felt rushed. There was no substance to many of the scenes. Rey has no training but can hold her own against Kylo (Who has been trained by Luke and Snoke his entire life). Luke was just running from Rey all over that fucking mountain. 

Star wars is known for its cheesy lines and moments\, but some of the lines in this movie simply poor writing.

Totally rushed through the Casino scenes\, might as well just cut the whole part out.

Kelly Marie Tran's character... yea\, didn't give two shits about her.

FN is a janitor defector but can beat Phasma in a fight... and Kylo with a saber? TF

When did Leia become a master of the force? Surviving an explosion\, the vacuum of space\, and just flew back in like Marry Poppins? Really?!

Using the ship running out of fuel for the driving force of the movie... Why?
"They can track us through light speed now". Fire who ever came up with that.

Disneys unlimited budget and this is the shit they come out with. SMH
